author: cnbc.com
title: The Rubicon Project reports 4Q loss
text:
LOS ANGELES (AP) _ The Rubicon Project Inc. (RUBI) on Wednesday reported a loss of $23.8 million in its fourth quarter.
The Los Angeles-based company said it had a loss of 48 cents per share. Losses, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to 28 cents per share.
The digital ad exchange operator posted revenue of $31.4 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss widened to $154.8 million, or $3.17 per share. Revenue was reported as $154.9 million.
In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, the company's shares hit $1.72. A year ago, they were trading at $8.39.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on RUBI at https://www.zacks.com/ap/RUBI
